attributes.review:
this is the wildest experience i have ever had with a app. after downloading it weird things started to happen. so lets start with there is a trashcan in my room ok and i hear it rattle as im scrolling down the app. when i look over to it, it stops. so at this point ima little 🎊freaked🎊 out ok.  so i brush it off and go back to looking at the app because i am so interested in how the cheeto man is going to 

👁make america 👄 great again 👁

 about 30 seconds into scrolling the trash 🗑 can flys up in the air and starts to attack me. after getting my one in on it i had just enough time ⏱ to get away 🏃 and then it started to chase me through the house 🏠and i make it out the front door 🚪 and shut it just in time so it didnt make it out the house. i here some friends of mine calling my name outside the house and they tell me that we have to go now. and im so confused 🤷🏼‍♀️ so we take off running and find a sewerage drain and i jump in first and one of my friends is behind me and the other two are above ground. next i hear gun shots so me n my friends take off running 🏃‍♀️ down the drain. once we reach the part where multiple drains connect. i asked my friend what we were running from and he said "ninjas" and immediately i was lost and to why ninjas was chasin us. and next thing i know i look 👀 up and there are so many ninjas looking down on us and i am running 🏃 back down the other way of the drain and they get my friend and killed him.. and obviously i made it out alive. so please for your own safety . please do not download this app. 🦷 thanks 🦷
attributes.title: DO NOT DO IT
